SecurityPolicyGroup.Name: Traffic to Internal Zones
SecurityPolicyGroup.Description: To LAN, WiFi, VPN, DMZ. Firewall rules with the destination zone as LAN, WiFi, VPN, DMZ would be added to this group on the first match basis if user selects automatic grouping option. This is the default group.

SecurityPolicyGroup.Name: Traffic to DMZ
SecurityPolicyGroup.Description: Inbound traffic to DMZ. Firewall rules with the destination zone as DMZ would be added to this group on the first match basis if user selects automatic grouping option. This is the default group.

SecurityPolicyGroup.Name: Traffic to WAN
SecurityPolicyGroup.Description: Outbound traffic to WAN. Firewall rules with the destination zone as WAN would be added to this group on the first match basis if user selects automatic grouping option. This is the default group.
